course.subject: ENVR
course.name: Corporate Sustainability: The Triple Bottom Line
course.description: In this course, you will learn how companies are aligning their sustainability strategies and goals with organizational business objectives to sustain profits over the long term. There will be a particular focus on externalities such a climate change, waste and water risks and weâ€™ll look at risk management tools, supply chain management, life-cycle analysis, sustainability reporting with many examples best practices in Hong Kong, Asia and globally.
